alert.note: Alert for Sherburne; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:04AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...URBAN AND SMALL STREAM FLOODING EXPECTED... Thunderstorms with heavy rain will cause minor flooding in the following counties... Sherburne...Stearns... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 503 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflow of water will result in minor flooding of poor drainage locations in the area. Over two inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... St. Cloud, Elk River, Big Lake, Waite Park, St. Joseph, Zimmerman, Becker, Cold Spring, Collegeville, Albany, Rockville and Clearwater.
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage areas and low lying spots. Please report flooding to your local law enforcement agency when you can do so safely.
